items.title: US Government Shutdown Ends As House Approves Funding Bill: Report
items.description: According to NBC, the House approved a funding package in a 217-214 vote on Tuesday, effectively ending the brief government shutdown.

items.title: This Stock Is Among The Laggards In Social Media Companies — Here’s What Wall Street Expects From Its Q4 Earnings Tomorrow
items.description: Snap shares have fallen nearly 45% over the past 12 months, only better than DJT, Sprout Social and Bumble over the same period.
